name: GloucesterGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Gloucester Guide”
”Alexa, ask Gloucester Guide to recommend an attraction within 3 miles”
”Alexa, tell Gloucester Guide lets go out”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gloucester guide
des: This skill will help you fix your boredom on a long day in Gloucester, Massachusetts. All you need is an Alexa enabled device and a need to do something fun. You can ask it to suggest something to do within a certain distance, ask it for meal breakfast, lunch, dinner or coffee recommendations. This skill will help you go out and see the awesome city around you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
